Module com.example.miniproyecto4
Package com.example.miniproyecto4.model.Board

Interface IBoard

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Board
public interface IBoard extends Serializable
Interface for the game board. Defines operations for managing cells, ships, and game state on the board.

      Gets the size of the board.
      Returns:

      x - The x coordinate

      Returns:

      Places a ship on the board.
      Parameters:
      ship - The ship to place
      Returns:
      true if the ship was placed successfully, false otherwise

      Removes a ship from the board.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the ship was removed successfully, false otherwise

    • getShips

      Gets the list of all ships on the board.

      IShip getShipAt(Coordinate coordinate)
      Gets the ship at the specified coordinate.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - The coordinate to check
      Returns:
      The ship at that coordinate, or null if no ship exists

    • hasShipAt

      boolean hasShipAt(Coordinate coordinate)
      Checks if there is a ship at the specified coordinate.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - The coordinate to check
      Returns:
      true if a ship exists at that coordinate, false otherwise

      boolean isValidCoordinate(Coordinate coordinate)
      Validates if a coordinate is within the board bounds.
      Parameters:
      coordinate - The coordinate to validate
      Returns:
      true if the coordinate is valid, false otherwise

    • allShipsSunk

      boolean allShipsSunk()
      Checks if all ships on the board are sunk.
      Returns:
      true if all ships are sunk, false otherwise
